dmca.title: [EV1-C2472306R] Copyright Violation in Hosting VFI LOANS Proprietary Code
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]

To: DMCA
Subject: [EV1-C2472306R] Copyright Violation in Hosting VFI LOANS
Proprietary Code

MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Sirs,
Please contact me as soon as possible regarding the following issue. The
contact should include addresses for your legal counsel and information
security representative. 
  
VFILOANS.NET web services registered by Mr. Mohsin Hameed and
representing VFI Loans of Livermore,CA is in violation of our copyright
and may be illegally hosting its web site under false pretenses. Mr. 
Hameed is not associated with VFI LOANS nor does he represent VFI, DCS,
or Performant Financial Corporation in any way. 
We wish to file a formal compliant to your service, the REGISTRAR and
any hosting services he has acquired to host the PROPRIETARY Web Code
shown on VFILOANS.NET. 
  
VFI LOANS is a subsidiary of Performant Financial Corporation located at
333 North Canyons Parkway, Livermore CA 94551. We have incorporated the
VFI Loans business unit since 2004. The following is an excerpt of our
formal statement of our corporate entity: 
  
 
Performant Companies and Services 
 
 
Founded on the unmatched 28-year success record of DCS (Diversified
Collection Services), Performant Financial Corporation today serves the
market through four principal lines of business: 
 
 
The Performant Companies 
 
 
DCS <http://www.performantcorp.com/dcs/index.htm>  (Diversified 
Collection Services, Inc.), is a leader in recovering government 
obligations such as student loans, state taxes, and federal debt. DCS 
has been a trusted partner to the U.S. Department of Education for over 
15 years, consistently outperforming competitors, sometimes by as much 
as 1000%, in terms of gross dollars recovered. DCS has also worked with 
the U.S. Department of Treasury for more than 8 years. The company 
boasts an unmatched track record of over $4 billion recovered for 
federal and state government clients. 
 
Performant Audit & Recovery 
<http://www.performantcorp.com/auditrecovery/index.htm> , is a division 
of Performant Financial Corporation providing audit and recovery 
capabilities to government and commercial healthcare payers. Performant 
Audit & Recovery was recently selected from among 52 firms to provide 
strategic recovery services to the Centers for Medicare Services. 
 
VFI <http://www.vfiloans.com/home.asp>  (Vista Financial, Inc.), is a 
student loan provider and loan consolidation originator. VFI helps 
borrowers to fund education, manage their finances, and repay 
outstanding loans. 
 
 
Performant Hosted Services 
 
 
Performant Hosted Services 
<http://www.performantcorp.com/hosting/index.htm>  provides proven and 
cost-effective application-based tools that enhance clients' in-house 
debt management capabilities. 
 
Combined our companies are currently handling an active receivables 
inventory of well over of $40 billion. All of our processes are fully 
compliant with major regulatory requirements. 
 
 
  
Felix Santos, CISM 
Chief Information Security Officer 
Director IT Security 
Performant Financial Corporation 
fsantos@performantcorp.com <blocked::mailto:fsantos@performantcorp.com> 
 
925-960-4780 (O) 
510-557-1499 (C)
